function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases such as Zika virus, Ebola virus, and Coronavirus","Impact":"Billions of dollars lost in GDP and local economies","Mitigation":"Implement strict containment measures, travel restrictions, and healthcare protocols","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, contact tracing apps, and quarantine infrastructure","People":"Travelers, local populations in affected areas, and service providers","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare professionals, and international organizations"}]}
